EmailTemplate.name: Email Deliverability test.Email send test.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: This is a test for email deliverability - Marketo
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Wintrust Selects NCR Digital First Banking Platform Wintrust Financial Corporation selects the NCR Digital First Banking Platform, including the NCR D3 and CSP solutions to power its digital transformation across their 15 bank brands and 180 locations. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Better understand and serve your business clients with up-to-the minute insights, news and more When it comes to serving businesses of any size, financial institutions must understand market trends, business challenges—and, ultimately, how to provide best-in-class digital banking that keeps your brand on top. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
